Roadmap

Now

  • Maintain a stable and playable two-player core loop.
  • Improve player onboarding and first-session clarity.
  • Keep rules, protocol, and docs aligned across surfaces.

Next

  • Complete reconnect behavior hardening for smoother session continuity.
  • Continue reliability and quality-of-life improvements for digital play.
  • Expand structured playtest and feedback loops.

Later

  • Additional UX polish and presentation quality improvements.
  • Optional expansion explorations (including Joker concepts).
  • Broader community growth based on playtest outcomes.

How This Connects to Delivery

  • Current status and limitations
  • Detailed engineering backlog
  • Ways to get involved

Roadmap order can change as reliability work and gameplay findings evolve.

Phalanx is a tactical two-player card duel playable with standard suited playing cards.
